fields.name: indemnitee_name
fields.description: Full legal name of the indemnitee (director or officer)

fields.name: company_name
fields.description: Name of the corporation providing indemnification

fields.name: fund_sponsor_name
fields.description: Name of the sponsoring fund or entity appointing the indemnitee

fields.name: indemnitee_role_plural
fields.description: Plural form of the primary role (e.g. directors)

fields.name: indemnitee_role_secondary_plural
fields.description: Plural form of the secondary role (e.g. officers)

fields.name: indemnitee_pronoun_possessive
fields.description: Possessive pronoun for the indemnitee entity (e.g. its)

fields.name: indemnitee_pronoun_possessive_plural
fields.description: Plural possessive pronoun for the indemnitee (e.g. their)

fields.name: bylaws_name
fields.description: Name of the company's bylaws document

fields.name: certificate_name
fields.description: Name of the company's certificate of incorporation

fields.name: and_appointing_stockholder
fields.description: Optional additional party text (e.g. 'and Appointing Stockholder') or empty string

fields.name: indemnification_section_letter
fields.description: Section reference letter for indemnification provisions in the certificate
